vote.title: Authorize Supplement Agreement No. 1 to exercise the first of three, two-year renewal options, to the service contract with Parking Concepts, Inc. in the amount of $1,748,276.76 and Parking Systems of America, Inc. in the amount of $6,883,631.04, for passenger and employee ground transportation management services at Dallas Love Field Airport for the Department of Aviation - Total not to exceed $8,631,907.80 - Financing: Aviation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize Supplement Agreement No. 1 to exercise the first of three, two-year renewal options, to the service contract with Parking Concepts, Inc. in the amount of $1,748,276.76 and Parking Systems of America, Inc. in the amount of $6,883,631.04, for passenger and employee ground transportation management services at Dallas Love Field Airport for the Department of Aviation - Total not to exceed $8,631,907.80 - Financing: Aviation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
